content: the scrubbie complete the round with a slip_stitch into the beginning st 52 slip_stitch hanging loop from the end of round 7 chain 15 or desired length then secure it with a slip_stitch into the back of your work where the chain began fasten_off and sew in both tails very securely you may need to give your work a little massage around the edges if it is too tight i also sat mine under a heavy item overnight enjoy x
